H0.text: Mendel is the name of the author who proposed natural selection as the mechanism of evolution.

H1.text: Darwin is the author who proposed natural selection as the mechanism of evolution.

H2.text: Lamarck is the author who proposed natural selection as the mechanism of evolution.

H3.text: Hardy-Weinberg is the name of the author who proposed natural selection as the mechanism of evolution.

A4.text: Darwin introduced his scientific theory that this branching pattern of evolution resulted from a process he called natural selection.

A5.text: Ronald Fisher incorporated Mendelian genetics in The Genetical Theory of Natural Selection, leading to population genetics and the modern evolutionary synthesis.
